message.body: Uh...for the sine part, right?
actully i got it. btw did u get the exam same answerd as cohen?my answers are different. like i did t get a 6/5....instead i got a 3/5
It's 3/5. He forgot Ts on the RHS.
You just squared and took the square root of H, yes?
i used eulers thing. then i got 3-3(cos (2pif..))/5-cos..jsin... and then i sqared the imaginaries and reals..and ya
oh btw do u think by any chance we will get to draw a graph using singualirty functions like in midterm one?
Doubt it. It's pretty easy if they do want us to do it.
no no its the hardest. out of all for me. like i still dont get tht stuff. lol
bibo stable i dnt get it either..argh
I haven't looked at Transforms since Thursday. It's like...if h exists it's BIBO or something.
he said if h(n) is absolutely summable then its Bibo. i dnt understand what that means
Me either. Some higher level math shit. Just memorize that line.
hm ok. btw how are u planning on studying for the exam?
Redoing the exam and maybe the last few quizzes.
seems like the final is based on only the content covered after the midterm right?
It's comprehensive. You need to know stuff before the midterm to do stuff on the final.
btw did u do that last question from homework 8 (the last hw)? i have a feeling that.cohen is gonna have the exact same qs in the.exam lol
Uh...no. I need to do it.
I haven't done the transforms HW entirely in ages.
when u do it. please let me.know i need to clarify some stuff..and compare answers. lol take my word.he will have that qs on the exam. lol mainly.because
noone payed attention to it :-P
fyi-- just read in a.book BiBo stable- if its impulse response is absolutely integrable or absolutely summable
the quiz 9 grade is up. i have failed ridiculously :O unbeleivable...idk y i got the frst partly right and the last part correct :-(
Just pick the biggest harmonics, man.
that's kinda wat i did :'(. this way il fail the final and i will have to retake the course..and omgg the end of.my life..
You have til Friday to study.
Just study everyday til then.
hey do u know how to do the last problem in hw 7? like how to get x(n) when the ck s are givn. idk if u were there when i asked that problem from cohen
